arts.ttl: Every player to wear both Leeds United and Brighton Shirts – some will shock you
arts.sum: A total of 21 players have played for both Leeds United and Brighton. Among those Georginio Rutter is the latest one to make the switch. Rutter recently has made his feelings for Leeds fans public. He also paid a unique tribute to both the clubs as he set for a reunion this afternoon. arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion host Leeds United on Saturday in a match defined by a remarkable historical record. The Seagulls have never lost a Premier League match to Leeds. Furthermore, they have kept a clean sheet in their last seven consecutive home league games against them. arts.ttl: Leeds United XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Leeds United travel to their ultimate bogey ground on Saturday, as they face Brighton & Hove Albion at the Amex Stadium. This is the ground where Leeds have played the most games in their entire history (9) without ever recording a single victory. arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler thinks ‘it’s not a surprise’ to see Leeds United competing in the top tier
arts.sum: “For me it's not a surprise if you saw Leeds playing last season in the Championship, they were already impressive. The Peacocks chose to continue working with Daniel Farke after he failed to return the team to the topflight in 2024, and they topped the Championship last campaign.

arts.sum: Leeds United make their way down to the AMEX Stadium on Saturday to face Brighton, looking for back-to-back wins after seeing off West Ham. United are six clear of the drop zone after their first nine games, and Daniel Farke will be pleased with this start. arts.ttl: Daniel Farke compliments a key Brighton attacker who has ‘progressed really well’
arts.sum: He spent some time talking about the qualities of two of their key figures he has encountered in the past: Fabian Hurzeler, the youngest Premier League manager, is a man he knows from Germany, and Georginio Rutter, a technically gifted French forward, was formerly on the books at Leeds. Their match management is not the strongest, but the talent in the group is visible to the Leeds head coach, who goes into their duel with respect.

arts.ttl: Georginio Rutter makes his feelings clear about Leeds United fans ahead of Saturday
arts.sum: Georginio Rutter was a fan favourite during his time at Leeds United. Spending close one-and-a-half years at the club he knows a thing or two about playing at Elland Road. Joining on a club record fee in January 2023, he left after failing to securing a promotion to the Premier League in 2024.
